location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication, dated 4 January 1815, from the Resident of Bushire concerning a dispute over rent between Mohummed ben Naser [Muḥammad bin Nāṣir] and Stephen Watson Henshaw, Marine Agent in the Persian Gulf. It instructs the Resident to report further on the matter.
